Package de.myfoo.commonj.timers

JSR 236 Timer implementation classes.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
FixedDelayTimer Fixed delay timer.
FixedRateTimer Fixed rate timer.
FooTimer A FooTimer is returned when a TimerListener is scheduled using one of the FooTimerManager.schedule methods.
FooTimerManager Implementation of the TimerManager.
FooTimerManagerFactory Factory class for TimerManagers.
OneShotTimer A timer that expires once and stops execution.
TimerExecutor Timer executor.
